post.body: I'm guessing it's just the fact that I look like that much trouble.
It's probably because we look like we're going to cause trouble. :)
This stuff's got bubbles. But yeah, basically, just juice.
Breakfast is always a great plan!
Ever heard of Dominion or Settlers of Catan? Lots of fun strategy games :)
That's totally one of my favorite blogs as well. Absolutely top notch!
Thanks for your help!
Yeah, Mint.com is definitely popular lately.
Happy Birthday!
I hope you feel better! and that the insurance doesn't give you too much stress
But you have us to hang out with all day!
I got carded while buying non-alcoholic sparkling cider this afternoon.
One more article and a half dozen emails left for the day.
Trying to finish up early so that I can bake for my New Year's Eve party. We're gonna play board games all night long. What are y'all doing?
What are your favorite personal finance sites of 2008?
Putting together some link love for the New Year.
Power keeps flickering in and out here â€” lacking better data, I blame the wind.
I think I've gotten all my holiday presents: they're pretty much all either books or gift certificates for books. Yay!
If you've done an international internship and want to be interviewed for an article, DM me!
I am a disease vector. *cough, cough*
